If you don't want to configure your system from scratch BitNami offers a public BitNami DjangoStack AMI that includes Python, Django, Apache with mod_wsgi, MySQL and PostgreSQL already configured.
You could also use BitNami Cloud Hosting.

It makes easier to manage your severs (start/stop, basic monitoring, resize images, schedule backups,...) we offer a free developer plan (you will still be charged by the Amazon if you are not part of the free tier).
Also mention that BitNami offers free native installers and virtual machines with the same environment that the AMI.
This makes easier to develop locally and then deploy your application in the BitNami DjangoStack AMI.
